name: Duckadoo
description:
Duckadoo is a game where you get to stop a cute rubber duckie from colliding with sharp spikes! Use your mouse to control the rubber duckie. Clicking will create a magical bubble and by dragging, you can push the duck around. Have fun playing and don't forget to rate the game!!!

Note: This game is not supposed to be good since I didn't put any effort into it cause this game was made for the Low Effort 8 Jam
